name: Doors a Recreation || #Games #All #Doors
description:
Doors a Recreation 14%

THIS IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT THINGS ARE SUBJECT TO BREAKING DUE TO GLITCHES!

~Controls~

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

C to crouch

E to interact

Mouse to look around

1 to equip the key

~Entities~

Rush

Ambush

Screech

Seek

Hide

~Entities being worked on~

Figure (MAINLY)

Eyes

Jack

Halt

Timothy

~Instructions~

[THIS IS IN ALPHA, More rooms, entities, and items are being added at some time in the future]

Your mission is to escape the Hotel...

You will have to dodge monster attacks and progress

This game is just trial and error, I recommend no help or guide to this game. YOU WILL MAKE IT THROUGH

If the project says "LIVE", that means I am actively 

working on it! :)

I am working on the figure and mobile support! :)

800 VIEWS?!?!??!? TYSM!! - 2/9/23

No.... 900!?!???!?!! - 2/11/23

1000!!!!!?!?!?!?! TYSM!!!! - 2/15/23

1340! Yay! - 2/22/23

~Notes and Credits~

A huge inspiration to DOORS by LSPLASH on Roblox

@buldier for seek sprites and ambush

@DimonKILL for death screen

@loosh24Ge for rush and screech sprite
